name: Dice of Faith
description:
This was made for the GMTK game jam. The only restriction for this game jam was making a game around the theme Roll of the Dice. The game was made in Unity.

The team:

Mathew - Programming.

KuerbisKosar - Programming, 3D modelling.

Lacha - Music & SFX, playtesting.

DrJokeSparrow - 3D modelling.

Credits:

GameAudioGDC - SFX
